summary:
Play as William Wallace from one of my favorite movies, BraveHeart (saved Game version.)
using the following Mods- 

Younger Male Faces-BY-BILLYRO
The Eyes Of Beauty-BY-GABRIEL MAILHOT
Storm Cloaks Mail And Tartan-BY-WARTYX
HN66s Long Eyelashes-BY-HUMANNATURE66
RaceMenu-BY-EXPIRED
descriptionHtml:
A Simple character I made to compliment my Skyrim roleplay desires. Since this is my first upload, I thought I would try something simple. If you want this exact look, be sure to try the following-

Younger Male Faces-BY-BILLYRO and 
The Eyes Of Beauty-BY-GABRIEL MAILHOT,
ALSO to finish it off take a look at
Storm Cloaks Mail And Tartan-BY-WartyX, another great mod :)

I took great care to give a thin yet balanced weight, give the character a stern and vengeful look,but also have a degree of fairness and honor in his brow.
author: The Noobetater
